name: Tell a Demon
description: Tell a Demon is a visual novel set in a 1920s style fantasy world, centering around themes of love, loss, and vengeance. Your choices affect the character development of each of the three protagonists, leading to sixteen different endings.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.66 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or GL Compatible Card Storage: 312 MB available space
